message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $95. We believe this price reflects the value it provides, and we're confident you'll find it worth every penny. Looking forward to your response!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're placing on your product. However, I'm looking to spend a bit less. Would you be willing to go down to $85?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. How about $90 for the product? This still allows us to maintain a fair profit while considering your budget.
